How to start a marketing line  
first of all, note that it requires  
large capital to be able to establish  
a make at line.  

Steps to take  

1) Conduct an thorough research.  
2) Draft a business plan.  
3) Choose a business name and register it.  
4) Lease a facility.  
5) Employ experienced staff.  
6) Market and promote your brand.
